hack_out.confirm: All earned points and payment records will be deleted. Are you sure you want to leave?
hack_out.title: Membership Withdrawal
hack_out.info:
ACON3D withdrawal guidance Thank you for coming to ACON3D.
We will improve ourselves so that we can greet you again with better service. I wish you all the best.
Also, please be aware of the following matters when you leave the membership.

1. Upon withdrawal from the membership, your information is managed in accordance with the Customer Information Protection Policy under the Consumer Protection Act in e-commerce, etc. for product returns or A/S.
2. If you leave, the points you held will be deleted.

validation.useAllCash:
You must use all your remaining ACON
cash or get a refund in order to
withdraw from your ACON account.
